T02D2787:153b-0: @153b * // bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs ras gri 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2787:153b-1: mi gang gnyid kyis log pa na //
T02D2787:153b-2: ma 'ongs bkra shis min pa yi //
T02D2787:153b-3: ltas gang byung bar gyur pa de //
T02D2787:153b-4: dga' ba'i ltas bstan mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2787:153b-5: 'di la btsun pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2787:153b-6: dad pa thob pa dka' thub can //
T02D2787:153b-7: brtse ldan dbang po dul ba yis //
T02D2787:153b-8: bzlog pa'i cho ga gsungs pa yin //
T02D2787:153b-10: gsol sbyong yan la gnas pas //
T02D2787:153b-11: shar du kha bltas gos bzang gyon //
T02D2787:153b-12: gdong bkrus me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2787:153b-13: gsum la skyabs song brtse chen gyis //
T02D2787:153b-14: sna tshogs mchod rdzas legs bshams la //
T02D2787:153b-15: spyan ras gzigs kyi sku gzugs shig / mdun du bdar te sdig pa bsal //
T02D2787:153b-16: skad chig cho gas lha mchog gi //
T02D2787:153b-17: rnal 'byor byas la de yi sku //
T02D2787:153b-18: zhal brgya phyag spyan stong ldan dang//
T02D2787:154a-0: @154a * // 'od phreng dkar po las grub pa'i //
T02D2787:154a-1: rdo rje ral gri be con dang //
T02D2787:154a-2: dgra sta lcags kyu kha tv'am ga //
T02D2787:154a-3: rdo rje dbyig pa rdo rje zhags //
T02D2787:154a-4: 'di brgyad re re las kyang stong //
T02D2787:154a-5: sprul pas 'khor yug bskor bar blta //
T02D2787:154a-6: 'khor lo rnam gsum bzlas pa yis //
T02D2787:154a-7: bcad dang gtub dang bsreg pa ni //
T02D2787:154a-8: ltas ngan rnam par bshig par byed //
T02D2787:154a-9: sna tshogs mchod pa sngon 'gro bas //
T02D2787:154a-10: gtor ma stong ni rab tu sbyin //
T02D2787:154a-11: de la sngags ni 'di yin te //
T02D2787:154a-12: ngag bsdams pa yi rgyun chags so //
T02D2787:154a-13: aom a'a:ma h'a ta th'a ga ta aashta sa ha
T02D2787:154a-14: ma h'a lo ke shva ra sa pa ri w'a
T02D2787:154a-15: ra ba lim ta p'u dza me gha sa mu
T02D2787:154a-16: dra spha ra na h'um h'um lan gsum gsum gyis
T02D2787:154a-18: ma ma ku teshti ku karmma sarba rbad tra sarba tha shan ka r'a phata /
T02D2787:154a-19: aa ka ru yis legs bdug cing //
T02D2787:154a-20: lha mchog mdun du rnam bsams pas //
T02D2787:154a-21: mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i sgra phyung ste //
T02D2787:154a-22: mkha' la gzha' ltar zhi bar bsams //
T02D2787:154a-23: sdig pa dang ni bkra shis min //
T02D2787:154a-24: dgra dang gdon kun rab 'jig pa //
T02D2787:154a-25: cho ga'i rgyal po ye shes mchog / spyan ras gzigs kyi brtag pa'o //
